attributes.title: Summary of recent stability and performance for Web Application Backend

200.html:
data

[object]

JSON:API data key with value of a list of Dashboard Reports

attributes

object

Attributes for Dashboard Report Schema

created_at

date-time

Datetime at which the report was created

description

string

description of the report to be used in both the user interface and as part of the e-mail body for each report sent. Must be less than 4 KiB in size as a utf-8 encoded string

destinations

object

report destination specific configuration. This configuration determines how the reports will be sent (currently, only e-mail destinations are supported)

email

object

e-mail based report destination

recipient_addresses

[string]

list of e-mail addresses to which to send reports.

modified_at

date-time

Datetime at which the report was most recently modified

schedule

object

report schedule specific configuration that defines when and how often a report should be sent.

active

boolean

Whether or not the given report schedule should be automatically sent per its schedule configuration. If set to false, the report will not be sent out.

frequency

enum

Frequency with which to send the report. Allowed enum values: 1d,2d,3d,4d,5d,6d,1w,2w,3w,1mo,2mo,3mo,4mo,5mo,6mo,7mo,8mo,9mo,10mo,11mo,12mo

repeat_at

enum

ISO8601 formatted time (HH:MM) at which to send out the report in the timezone specified in the timezone field Allowed enum values: 00:00,00:30,01:00,01:30,02:00,02:30,03:00,03:30,04:00,04:30,05:00,05:30,06:00,06:30,07:00,07:30,08:00,08:30,09:00,09:30,10:00,10:30,11:00,11:30,12:00,12:30,13:00,13:30,14:00,14:30,15:00,15:30,16:00,16:30,17:00,17:30,18:00,18:30,19:00,19:30,20:00,20:30,21:00,21:30,22:00,22:30,23:00,23:30

repeat_on_day_of_month

enum

If the frequency field is on the order of months (e.g. '1mo'), this field is required and defines which day of the month to send the monthly report. If the frequency field is not on the order of months (e.g. '1d', '1w'), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request and the update request changes the frequency to something on the order of days (e.g. '1d'), then this field will automatically be nulled out. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_week and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_week. Allowed enum values: 1st,15th

repeat_on_day_of_week

enum

If the frequency field is on the order of weeks (e.g. '1w'), this field is required and defines which day of the week to send the weekly report. If the frequency field is not on the order of weeks (e.g. '1d', '1mo'), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request and the update request changes the frequency to something on the order of days (e.g. '1d'), then this field will automatically be nulled out. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_month and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_month. Allowed enum values: Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday

timezone

string

Timezone to use for repeat_at. Must be a valid timezone database name.

template_variables

object

template variables to use to parameterize the dashboard when generating a report

<any-key>

string

key/value pairs for template variables

timeframe

enum

period of time that the widgets in the dashboard report should cover at the time of report generation. Allowed enum values: 5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,2d,1w,1mo

title

string

title of the report to be used in both the user interface and as part of the e-mail subject for each report sent.

id [required]

string

ID of the Dashboard Report

relationships

object

Relationships to a Dashboard Report

dashboard

object

Dashboard associated with Report

data [required]

object

JSON:API data representing the dashboard with which a report is associated

id [required]

string

ID of the Dashboard with which the Report is associated. Screenboards (dashboards with layout_type=FREE) are not supported by reporting at this time.

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the Report's associated Dashboard Allowed enum values: dashboards

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the Dashboard Report Allowed enum values: dashboard_reports

403.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

404.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

422.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

429.html:
errors [required]

[string]

A list of errors.

request.html:
data [required]

object

JSON:API data key

attributes

object

Attributes of a dashboard report that can be updated. Fields that are not to be updated can be omitted, with some caveats around the repeat_on_day_of_week and repeat_on_day_of_month behaviors as noted elsewhere.

description

string

description of the report to be used in both the user interface and as part of the e-mail body for each report sent. Must be less than 4 KiB in size as a utf-8 encoded string

destinations

object

report destination specific configuration. This configuration determines how the reports will be sent (currently, only e-mail destinations are supported)

email

object

e-mail based report destination

recipient_addresses

[string]

list of e-mail addresses to which to send reports.

schedule

object

report schedule specific configuration that defines when and how often a report should be sent.

active

boolean

Whether or not the given report schedule should be automatically sent per its schedule configuration. If set to false, the report will not be sent out.

frequency

enum

Frequency with which to send the report. Allowed enum values: 1d,2d,3d,4d,5d,6d,1w,2w,3w,1mo,2mo,3mo,4mo,5mo,6mo,7mo,8mo,9mo,10mo,11mo,12mo

repeat_at

enum

ISO8601 formatted time (HH:MM) at which to send out the report in the timezone specified in the timezone field Allowed enum values: 00:00,00:30,01:00,01:30,02:00,02:30,03:00,03:30,04:00,04:30,05:00,05:30,06:00,06:30,07:00,07:30,08:00,08:30,09:00,09:30,10:00,10:30,11:00,11:30,12:00,12:30,13:00,13:30,14:00,14:30,15:00,15:30,16:00,16:30,17:00,17:30,18:00,18:30,19:00,19:30,20:00,20:30,21:00,21:30,22:00,22:30,23:00,23:30

repeat_on_day_of_month

enum

If the frequency field is on the order of months (e.g. '1mo'), this field is required and defines which day of the month to send the monthly report. If the frequency field is not on the order of months (e.g. '1d', '1w'), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request and the update request changes the frequency to something on the order of days (e.g. '1d'), then this field will automatically be nulled out. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_week and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_week. Allowed enum values: 1st,15th

repeat_on_day_of_week

enum

If the frequency field is on the order of weeks (e.g. '1w'), this field is required and defines which day of the week to send the weekly report. If the frequency field is not on the order of weeks (e.g. '1d', '1mo'), then this field must be null (if provided). If this field is not provided in an update request and the update request changes the frequency to something on the order of days (e.g. '1d'), then this field will automatically be nulled out. This field is mutually exclusive with repeat_on_day_of_month and cannot be defined in the same request that includes a non-null value for repeat_on_day_of_month. Allowed enum values: Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday

timezone

string

Timezone to use for repeat_at. Must be a valid timezone database name.

template_variables

object

template variables to use to parameterize the dashboard when generating a report

<any-key>

string

key/value pairs for template variables

timeframe

enum

period of time that the widgets in the dashboard report should cover at the time of report generation. Allowed enum values: 5m,15m,30m,1h,4h,1d,2d,1w,1mo

title

string

title of the report to be used in both the user interface and as part of the e-mail subject for each report sent.

id [required]

string

ID of the report to update

type [required]

enum

JSON:API type of the Dashboard Report Allowed enum values: dashboard_reports
